prompt: Design a mobile-first forgot password screen optimized for smartphone usage with thumb-friendly interactions. Use full-screen approach with subtle background texture and position elements in lower two-thirds for easy thumb reach. Include large friendly 'Reset Password' heading with lock emoji for visual appeal. Add conversational explanation text like 'Don't worry, it happens to the best of us!' Create large easy-to-tap email input with rounded corners and adequate padding. Design extra-large submit button with rounded pill shape and vibrant green color. Include prominent back link with arrow icon and ensure all touch targets are 44px minimum with larger fonts for mobile readability.
